descriptionHtml:
Torch Sconces can be crafted at any forge out of; 
1 firewood, and 1 Iron Ingot. 
1 Torch is required to be placed in the Sconce.

To place the Sconce 
-drop it from your inventory
-Place by grabbing (hold the activation key) release it once you have it where you want it
-Activate the sconce to lock it in place
-Now activating it will place/remove a torch
-Grab it again to pick it up and move it to your inventory

Thanks to Nozi87 for his Youtube review.
author: Mentilreq
